servinfo.title: Excessive detonation – Engine makes continuously sharp metallic knocks that change with throttle opening. Sounds like pop corn popping
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the following when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:N32A and Engine Basic Inspection:N32A .

condition.ptxt: Excessive detonation – Engine makes continuously sharp metallic knocks that change with throttle opening. Sounds like pop corn popping

ps.ptxt: Clogged fuel filter (faulty fuel pump) or fuel lines

action.ptxt: Fuel Pressure Check:N32A or Fuel Pump and Its Circuit Check:N32A

ps.ptxt: Air drawn in through intake manifold or throttle body gasket
Poor performance of knock sensor, ECT sensor or MAF sensor

action.ptxt: Knock Sensor Inspection:N32A , Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection:N32A or Mass Air Flow (MAF) & Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor Inspection:N32A

ptxt.intxref: Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits:N32A

action.ptxt: Cylinder Head Inspection:N32A and Piston and Piston Ring Inspection:N32A

ps.ptxt: – Dirty or clogged fuel hose or pipe
CMP position control system out of order
